description:
What do C-Suite Executives Pay Attention To?
Speaker: Dingqian (Sara) Liu

Summary
Using public listed firms' quarterly earnings call transcripts and Natural Language Processing (NLP), I construct macro attention and micro attention index to measure executives' attention capacity and attention allocation towards macroeconomics. The results indicate that firms expand attention capacity and allocate more attention to macroeconomics during the recession.

Description
Everyone has limited attention. They process information from inner communication and outside environment, on which they make decisions based.
Why attention capacity and attention allocation towards macroeconomics.
Introducing Text Data.
Introducing TF-IDF.
Term Selection and index construction.
Presenting attention capacity & allocation for firms with various characteristics

Dingqian (Sara) Liu's Bio
I am an Economics Ph.D. candidate at American University. My research interests are Corporate Finance, Behavioral Finance and Macroeconomics. Besides being a Ph.D. Candidate, I am an Adjunct Instructor (teaching Economics in Business 2021 Fall), Financial Economist, and a Machine-Learning & Natural Language Processing (NLP) enthusiast.
